attributes.action: Tony Foulds should get an MBE for the remembrance of fallen fighters.
attributes.background: He has shown so much hard work and dedication since he was a little boy to make sure those who sacrificed their life were remembered. He has gone to the memorial every single day of his life to return the thanks of giving him a good life to live and kept the memorial in a good condition.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
